item.title: Past Experiences' Summaries
item.description: Since this website is first populated on 13/8/2021, there are many past experiences that I have failed to keep track of or I have failed to give the credits due. Hence, I would like to put the explanation about past projects and internships here! After this, each major project or internship worth highlighting would be explained on dedicated post!
